title: Ensemble precipitation nowcasting by combination of generative and transformer deep learning models
description: This work introduces a novel deep-learning method for generating realistic ensembles nowcast of radar-based precipitation at a five-minute time resolution for the next 60 minutes and longer.

title: Precipitation nowcasting by the combination of generative and transformer deep learning models
Progetto MIARAD: nowcasting radar con deep learning a scala regionale
Pacchettizzare applicazioni Python in un singolo file binario
Sistema chatbot di allerta real-time per eventi meteo intensi integrante modelli di nowcasting basati su Intelligenza Artificiale
